mapper.sql: uid, uname, phone, email, password, img, address, sex, birthday, profession, http, description
mapper.select: select uid,uname,img from users where uid=${uid}
mapper.insert:
insert into users
uid,
uname,
phone,
email,
password,
img,
address,
sex,
birthday,
profession,
http,
description,

mapper.update:
update users
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
http = #{http,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, http = #{http,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
